name: planets escape
description:
Space:  Burp and destroy nearby planets.

it's as simple as the name says just dodge planets and collect powerups.

Hello , This is my first ever game that i finished . i got the inspiration to finish this for the brackeys game jam . but im really happy with the outcome . i just started learning unity 2 weeks ago and i tried to implement everything i learned.even tho the code was a mess and next time 100% il organise it more . this game taught me a lot of new things . im really waiting for any feedback about it .don't hesitate criticizing me. im ready to make any change you say.
so about the game now . you have to dodge the planets and try collecting coins and powerups the difficulity gets harded every 30 seconds or when you touch the planets it rewinds you back and make it harder a little bit at the end it will fill up with planets that you can't dodge anymore and you will be pushed out of the screen.
you can upgrade the powerups in the shop menu so you can make higher score.
